CustomField.defaultValue: IF ( DATEVALUE($System.OriginDateTime ) >= DATE ( YEAR (DATEVALUE($System.OriginDateTime)),3,1) + ( 14- CASE( MOD(DATE ( YEAR (DATEVALUE($System.OriginDateTime)),3,1) - DATE (1900,1,7),7) , 0,7,MOD(DATE ( YEAR (DATEVALUE($System.OriginDateTime)),3,1) - DATE (1900,1,7),7)) ) && DATEVALUE($System.OriginDateTime) < DATE ( YEAR (DATEVALUE($System.OriginDateTime)),11,1) + ( 7- CASE( MOD(DATE ( YEAR (DATEVALUE($System.OriginDateTime)),11,1) - DATE (1900,1,7),7) , 0,7,MOD(DATE ( YEAR (DATEVALUE($System.OriginDateTime)),11,1) - DATE (1900,1,7),7)) ), 1, 2 )
CustomField.description: Zona horaria de la fecha de escritura del post
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Zona horaria de la fecha de escritura del post
CustomField.label: Zona horaria
